text: (born February 2, 2001) is a Japanese pop singer idol, and a 12th generation member of Japanese girl group Morning Musume. ==Biography== On November 1, 2012, Makino joined Hello Pro Kenshuusei. On November 20, it was officially announced that Makino joined Hello Pro Kenshuusei. ==Overview== In summer 2014, Maria auditioned for the Morning Musume '14 (Golden) Audition! for an opportunity to join Morning Musume '14 and successfully passed. She was introduced as a 12th generation member during Morning Musume '14's concert at Nippon Budokan on September 30, alongside Haruna Ogata, Miki Nonaka and Akane Haga, effectively leaving Hello Pro Kenshuusei the same day. == Hello! title: Maria Makino
